name: Five
author: Armeen Talwandi, Amy Li, Angela Du, Denise Albeanu
description:
5 topics. 5 articles. 5 minutes. 
A single sentence can set off a lifetime of change. Every change starts with an idea, and every idea starts with a read. 
All it takes is 5 minutes a day to jump start your journey to bring about change. This extension provides you with 5 new 
articles everyday, each one corresponding to one of the 5 topics in the SDG, ‘Industry’,:
1. Decent Work
2. Innovation 
3.Infrastructure
4.Environmental Sustainability
5.Consumption and Production

All articles are published by the New York Times.
